sentence: Wins by some of the candidates challenging GOP members who voted to impeach Trump last year, like Reps. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.) and Dan Newhouse (R-Wash.), could pad the numbers even more.
title: The primary foreshadowing the future of the GOP

sentence: Wins by some of the candidates challenging GOP members who voted to impeach Trump last year, like Reps. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.) and Dan Newhouse (R-Wash.), could pad the numbers even more," with GOP campaign advisor Doug Heye adding, "The next speaker is going to have a hard time governing the House."
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Kevin McCarthy squaring off with far-right Republicans over pivotal House seat: report
